00030 #include "prefixsettings.h"
00031 
00032 PrefixSettings::PrefixSettings(QString prefix_name, QWidget * parent, Qt::WFlags f) : QDialog(parent, f)
00033 {
00034     setupUi(this);
00035     
00036     this->prefix_name=prefix_name;
00037     
00038     QSettings settings(APP_NAME, "default");
00039     settings.beginGroup("app");
00040         loadThemeIcons(settings.value("theme").toString());
00041     settings.endGroup();    
00042     
00043     QSqlQuery query;
00044     query.prepare("select id, wine_dllpath, wine_loader, wine_server, wine_exec, cdrom_mount, cdrom_drive, name, path from prefix where name=:name");
00045     query.bindValue(":name", prefix_name);
00046     if (!query.exec()){
00047         #ifdef DEBUG
00048             qDebug()<<"WARNING: SQL error at MainWindow::PrefixSettings()\nINFO:\n"<<query.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<query.lastError();
00049         #endif
00050         return;
00051     }
00052     query.first();
00053     
00054     if (query.value(0).toString().isNull())
00055         return;
00056     
00057     prefix_id=query.value(0).toString();
00058     
00059     txtWineLibs->setText(query.value(1).toString());
00060     txtWineLoaderBin->setText(query.value(2).toString());
00061     txtWineServerBin->setText(query.value(3).toString());
00062     txtWineBin->setText(query.value(4).toString());
00063         
00064     //comboDeviceList
00065     txtMountPoint->setText(query.value(5).toString());
00066     
00067     if (prefix_name=="Default"){
00068         txtPrefixName->setEnabled(FALSE);
00069         txtPrefixPath->setEnabled(FALSE);
00070         cmdGetPrefixPath->setEnabled(FALSE);
00071     } else {
00072         cmdGetPrefixPath->installEventFilter(this); 
00073     }
00074     
00075     txtPrefixName->setText(query.value(7).toString());
00076     txtPrefixPath->setText(query.value(8).toString());
00077     
00078     getprocDevices();
00079     
00080     comboDeviceList->setCurrentIndex (comboDeviceList->findText(query.value(6).toString()));
00081     
00082     connect(cmdCancel, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdCancel_Click()));
00083     connect(cmdOk, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdOk_Click()));
00084     
00085     cmdGetWineBin->installEventFilter(this);
00086     cmdGetWineServerBin->installEventFilter(this);
00087     cmdGetWineLoaderBin->installEventFilter(this);
00088     cmdGetWineLibs->installEventFilter(this);
00089     
00090     cmdGetMountPoint->installEventFilter(this);
00091     
00092     return;
00093 }

00097 void PrefixSettings::loadThemeIcons(QString themePath){
00098     QPixmap pixmap;
00099                 
00100     if (!pixmap.load(tr("%1/data/exec.png").arg(themePath))){
00101         pixmap.load(":data/exec.png");
00102     }
00103                 
00104     lblLogo->setPixmap(pixmap);
00105         
00106     cmdGetWineBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00107     cmdGetWineServerBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00108     cmdGetWineLoaderBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00109     cmdGetWineLibs->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00110 
00111     cmdGetMountPoint->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00112     cmdGetPrefixPath->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00113         
00114     return;
00115 }
00116 
00117 
00118 QIcon PrefixSettings::loadIcon(QString iconName, QString themePath){
00119     // Function tryes to load icon image from theme dir
00120     // If it fails -> load default from rsource file
00121     
00122     QIcon icon;
00123     
00124     if ((!themePath.isEmpty()) and (themePath!="Default")){
00125         icon.addFile(tr("%1/%2").arg(themePath).arg(iconName));
00126         if (icon.isNull()){
00127             icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
00128         }
00129     } else {
00130         icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
00131     }
00132 
00133     return icon;    
00134 }
00135 
00136 void PrefixSettings::getprocDevices(){
00137     /*
00138         Getting divice names at /proc/diskstats
00139     */
00140 
00141     QString name, procstat, path, prefix;;
00142         
00143     QFile file("/etc/fstab");
00144     if (!file.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly | QIODevice::Text)){
00145         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, i can't access to /etc/fstab"));
00146     }
00147         
00148     //int indOf;
00149     comboDeviceList->addItem(tr("<none>"));
00150 
00151     while (1) {
00152         QByteArray line = file.readLine();
00153         
00154         if (line.isEmpty())
00155             break;
00156         
00157         if (line.indexOf("cdrom")>=0){
00158             QList<QByteArray> array = line.split(' ').at(0).split('\t');
00159                 comboDeviceList->addItem(array.at(0));
00160         }
00161     }
00162     file.close();
00163     
00164     return;
00165 }
00166 
00167 void PrefixSettings::cmdCancel_Click(){
00168     reject();
00169     return; 
00170 }
00171 
00172 void PrefixSettings::cmdOk_Click(){
00173     QSqlQuery query;
00174     
00175     if (prefix_name!=txtPrefixName->text()){
00176     
00177         query.prepare("select id from prefix where name=:name");
00178         query.bindValue(":name", txtPrefixName->text());
00179         query.exec();
00180         query.first();
00181         
00182         if (query.isValid ()){
00183             QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, but prefix named %1 already exists.").arg(txtPrefixName->text()));
00184             query.clear();
00185             return;
00186         }
00187         
00188         query.clear();
00189     
00190     }
00191     
00192     query.prepare("UPDATE prefix SET wine_dllpath=:wine_dllpath, wine_loader=:wine_loader, wine_server=:wine_server, wine_exec=:wine_exec, cdrom_mount=:cdrom_mount, cdrom_drive=:cdrom_drive, name=:name, path=:path WHERE id=:id;");
00193     query.bindValue(":wine_dllpath", txtWineLibs->text());
00194     query.bindValue(":wine_loader", txtWineLoaderBin->text());
00195     query.bindValue(":wine_server", txtWineServerBin->text());
00196     query.bindValue(":wine_exec", txtWineBin->text());
00197 
00198     if (txtMountPoint->text().endsWith ("/"))
00199         txtMountPoint->setText(txtMountPoint->text().mid(0, txtMountPoint->text().length()-1));
00200 
00201     query.bindValue(":cdrom_mount", txtMountPoint->text());
00202     if (comboDeviceList->currentText()!=tr("<none>")){
00203         query.bindValue(":cdrom_drive", comboDeviceList->currentText());
00204     } else {
00205         query.bindValue(":cdrom_drive", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00206     }
00207     query.bindValue(":name", txtPrefixName->text());
00208     query.bindValue(":path", txtPrefixPath->text());
00209     query.bindValue(":id", prefix_id);
00210     
00211     if (!query.exec()){
00212         #ifdef DEBUG
00213             qDebug()<<"WARNING: SQL error at MainWindow::PrefixSettings::cmdOd_Click()\nINFO:\n"<<query.executedQuery()<<"\n"<<query.lastError();
00214         #endif
00215         return;
00216     }
00217     
00218     query.clear();
00219     
00220     accept();
00221     return;
00222 }
00223 
00224 bool PrefixSettings::eventFilter(QObject *obj, QEvent *event){
00225     /*
00226      * Select folder dialog
00227      */
00228 
00229     if (event->type() == QEvent::MouseButtonPress) {
00230         
00231         QString file;
00232         
00233         if (obj->objectName().right(3)=="Bin"){
00234             file = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, tr("Open File"), QDir::homePath(),   "All files (*.*)");
00235         } else {
00236             file = QFileDialog::getExistingDirectory(this, tr("Open Directory"), QDir::homePath(),   QFileDialog::DontResolveSymlinks);
00237         }
00238             
00239         if (!file.isEmpty()){
00240             QString a;
00241             
00242             a.append("txt");
00243             a.append(obj->objectName().right(obj->objectName().length()-6));
00244             
00245             QLineEdit *lineEdit = findChild<QLineEdit *>(a);
00246             
00247             if (lineEdit){
00248                 lineEdit->setText(file);
00249             } else {
00250                 qDebug("Error");    
00251             }
00252         }
00253     }
00254     
00255     return FALSE;   
00256 }
